If you're looking for a sport-themed movie with high-energy action, I recommend "Speed Racer" (2008). It features young racecar driver Speed Racer and his high-tech Mach 5 car in an adventure-filled world of racing and friendship.

For a more dramatic movie that explores the challenges small businesses face during a pandemic, "Chain Reaction" (1996) could be interesting. The film focuses on the impact the COVID-19 has on small businesses and their adaptation strategies.
